name: Squire
bio: Squire started this website to give the power back to the people. He enjoys watching people do things. Lives in New York.

name: Overripebug
bio: Overripebug currently works at a startup. Previously graduated with a math degree from Williams College. Enjoys gefilte fish in his free time.

name: Alejandro Armstrong
bio: Jake Block is a native of Ballston Spa New York, founded by the Methodist Minister Ephraim Ball in 1872. Ball had 8 children, only 2 of whom—Onan and Lot—survived to adulthood. Ball died destitute in a whore house in 1901, riddled with clamidia.
